p: The MIA injection significantly decreased SOD activity in the rats’ synovial tissue ( P < 0.001) (Fig. 2b). Although administration of the nanoemulsion gel, nanoemulsion solution, essential oils gel and diclofenac sodium gel significantly elevates SOD activity in the rats’ synovial tissue ( P < 0.05), but the diclofenac sodium gel elevates SOD activity more than the other treatments.
